basic.floral_language:
Jasminum sambac
Floriography: kind, gentle and pure 
Jasminum sambac beautiful long remembered, “a beautiful jasmine flower, beautiful fragrance full of branches, incense and white every one appreciates". It is the city flower of Fuzhou. 
Leaves are dark green, oblong or ovoid shape. Flower color is white. Fragrant flowers can make tea, with effects in helping digestion, detoxification, antibacterial, facial protection. 
Jasminum sambac likes sunshine, but shade is needed under summer noon light. Flowering from May to August, ornamental period of 2 to 3 weeks.
basic.blooming: Flowering period May-August, viewing period 2-3 weeks

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Likes adequate sunshine and ventilated places, shade properly under summer strong light, when flowering put in the places with scattered light
maintenance.watering: Not resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry, water less frequently in winter dormancy
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly in spring and summer
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and yellowish leaves, withered flowers, overstocked branches timely
